widget.name: CKEditor for Mendix
widget.description: The CKEditor WYSIWYG online HTML editor.

property.caption: Content attribute
property.description: Attribute to store the input to.

property.caption: On key press Microflow
property.description: Microflow which is triggered when a key press event occurs.

property.caption: On Change Microflow
property.description: Microflow which is triggered when the content is changed on blur

property.caption: Entermode
property.description: Set the behavior of the Enter key

property.caption: Shift-Entermode
property.description: Set the behavior of the Shift+Enter key

property.caption: Autoparagraph
property.description: Whether to automatically create wrapping blocks around inline content inside the document body. (This option is deprecated. Changing the default value (true) might introduce unpredictable usability issues and is highly unrecommended.)

property.caption: Spell-checker
property.description: Whether to apply the browser's spell checking to the input area.

property.caption: Toolbar
property.description: Show the document toolbar with toolbar 'mode', 'doctools', 'doctools'.

property.caption: Clipboard
property.description: Show the clipboard toolbar with toolbar 'clipboard', 'undo'.

property.caption: Editing
property.description: Show the editing toolbar with toolbar 'find', 'selection', 'spellchecker'.

property.caption: Forms
property.description: Show the forms toolbar.

property.caption: Seperator 1
property.description: Show the seperator one.

property.caption: Basicstyles
property.description: Show the basicstyles toolbar with toolbar 'basicstyles', 'cleanup'.

property.caption: Paragraph
property.description: Show the paragraph toolbar with toolbar 'list', 'indent', 'blocks', 'align', 'bidi'.

property.caption: Links
property.description: Show the links toolbar.

property.caption: Insert
property.description: Show the insert toolbar.

property.caption: Seperator 2
property.description: Show the seperator two.

property.caption: Styles
property.description: Show the styles toolbar.

property.caption: Colors
property.description: Show the colors toolbar.

property.caption: Tools
property.description: Show the tools toolbar.

property.caption: Others
property.description: Show the others toolbar.

property.caption: Use custom toolbar
property.description: Use custom toolbar instead of the toolbars defined in 'Document'

property.caption: Toolbars
property.description: Define custom toolbars

property.caption: Button
property.description: Button Type

property.caption: Toolbar ID
property.description: Identifies in which toolbar this button appears. Make sure to give this a short and descriptive identifier. Items with the same Toolbar ID will be grouped

property.caption: Body CSS Class
property.description: A CSS Class that is set on the body of the editable content to create a visual appearance as within the end result where the CSS would have been applyed to.

property.caption: Width
property.description: Width of the widget in pixels. 0 for default width.

property.caption: Height
property.description: Height of the widget content area in pixels. 0 for default height.

property.caption: Show Label
property.description: Show a label for the field.

property.caption: Label Caption
property.description: Specify the caption to use for the label

property.caption: Maximize offset
property.description: Specify the pixel offset when maximizing the widget. Sometimes a Mendix app will contain a toolbar at the top that will overlap the maximized editor. Usually this is 50px.

property.caption: Show Status Bar
property.description: Show status bar (Bottom). Note: Make sure you disable the Count plugin (Count --> Count plugin), otherwise the status bar will still be shown. This will also disable resizing of the editor.

property.caption: Collapse toolbar
property.description: If you enable this, the toolbar at the top of the editor will be collapsed by default. (The user can expand it by clicking the button at the topright corner)

property.caption: Enable code highlighting
property.description: CKEditor can be used as a code editor. If you want to enable code highlighting, please enable this. Note: You should add enable this for the Viewer as well

property.caption: Microflow links
property.description: Microflows which can be linked to in the text.

property.caption: Link Name
property.description: Descriptive name of a microflow, which can be inserted as link in the document. The mapping of the name to a real microflow is the responsibility of the Rich Text Viewer.

property.caption: Image Mode
property.description: Would you like to include the images as base64 strings or upload them?

property.caption: Image Entity
property.description: When setting the Image mode to 'Upload', please set this Entity. This domain entity will be insertable as image. Should inherit from System.Image

property.caption: Image upload Microflow
property.description: Microflow which is triggered when the image is uploaded

property.caption: XPath Constraint
property.description: This constraint might be used to filter the set of browsable images. (not functional right now)

property.caption: Use image style size
property.description: This will use the normal 'style' property on an image to set the dimensions. If you set this false, it will set the width and height as a normal html property. This is sometimes needed when using images in document templates (PDF generation)

property.caption: Count plugin
property.description: Enable/disable wordcount plugin. This will have the ability to set a max amount of characters

property.caption: Maximum characters
property.description: If the Count plugin is enabled, specifiy the max amount of characters (including HTML). If you set this to 0, it will be unlimited.
